name: Blank-wordpress-theme
body:
## Blank WordPress Theme

This blank WordPress theme as actually become the backbone for http://wpbuild.me.

You can download a customized version of this theme there, or you can download this and follow the usage instructions below.

### Old Usage
- Install into WordPress
- Style.
- Done.
tagline: Blank WordPress theme I use when starting a new project
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
